ygData.subject: [EQBards] Just a thought.....
ygData.msgSnippet: The new bard 1HS looks amazing, I ve always wanted to look like a Final Fantasy character.  Just a thought though on the new monk only Cane of Harmony.  Anyone
ygData.messageBody:
The new bard 1HS looks amazing, I've always wanted to look like a Final Fantasy character. Just a thought though on the new monk only Cane of Harmony. Anyone else think this is a mistake? I'm just thinking perhaps they input another wrong number in the database and made this item monk only and not bard only:

Cane of Harmony
MAGIC ITEM
Skill: 1H Blunt Atk Delay: 25
DMG: 12
STR: +4 DEX: +4 CHA: +8 INT: +8
WT: 3.2
CLASS: MNK
Race: ALL

Just a thought.

Weiland
Permanently 30 something bard of E. Marr


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
